translation.en: Wow!
-♪ Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! ♪ -♪ Hey! ♪
translation.ko: - 빅 트리 시티 구조대, 출동! - 헤이!

translation.en: ♪ Big Tree City ♪
-♪ Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! ♪ -♪ Hey! ♪
translation.ko: - 빅 트리 시티 구조대, 출동! - 헤이!

translation.en: ♪ Big Tree City ♪
-♪ Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! ♪ -♪ Hey! ♪
translation.ko: - 빅 트리 시티 구조대, 출동! - 헤이!

translation.en: ♪ La, la, la La, la, la, la, la ♪
♪ La, la, la La, la, la, la, la ♪
♪ La, la, la La, la, la, la ♪
♪ Let's go! ♪
-[cheering] -That's fantastic!
Smiling faces, colorful balloons, and smooth-talking news anchors.
translation.ko: 웃는 얼굴들, 형형색색의 풍선 그리고 말 잘하는 뉴스 앵커

translation.en: It's a windy day for the annual Big Tree City balloon parade,
translation.ko: 올해도 빅 트리 시티의 연례 대형 풍선 퍼레이드가

translation.en: famous for its huge balloons.
A marvelous occasion concluding at the glorious Horatio Bear Monument.
translation.ko: 이 화려한 행사의 종착지는 장엄한 호레이쇼 베어 기념탑이죠

translation.en: Parade day!
Balloons! Barade palloons!
Oh, I always wanted to see the famous parade balloons!
translation.ko: 그 유명한 퍼레이드 풍선을 드디어 보게 됐어!

translation.en: It's my first time!
Shall we go, then?
Yes. It's going to be amazing!
[Prickles] Ah! It sure is.
[laughs] It's gonna be great. Isn't it, Splash? Yeah. I can't wait!
translation.ko: - 멋질 거야, 안 그래, 스플래시? - 네, 너무 기대돼요!

translation.en: Me too. It's gonna be fantastic.
A real doozy.
A real doozy?
Just you and me.
Plumbing.
Plumbing?
Plumbing.
See?
This means it's Bonding Day with Splash.
You are gonna teach me all about plumbing, right here in HQ.
translation.ko: 이 본부에서 배관 작업의 모든 걸 내게 가르치는 거지

translation.en: -And we'll bond. [laughs] -Ah.
Hey, Major, I was thinking, with the parade happening and everything,
translation.ko: 대장님, 생각해 봤는데 퍼레이드를 하는 날이니까

translation.en: maybe we could delay Bonding Day.
-[phone rings] -Uh, one moment, Splash.
[clears throat] Big Tree City Rescue, ready to rescue you.
Oh no. Team, to the briefing room.
translation.ko: 오, 안 돼 팀, 회의실로 모여

translation.en: Listen up, team.
Mr. Pig has got himself stuck in a bin on the parade path.
translation.ko: 피그 씨가 퍼레이드 경로에 있는 쓰레기통에 갇혔어

translation.en: If we don't help him, it could ruin the parade.
translation.ko: 우리가 안 도우면 퍼레이드를 망치고 말 거야

translation.en: -[all gasp] -And the beloved balloons.
Pecky, Flame, Stripes, get him out of there without disrupting the parade.
translation.ko: 페키, 플레임, 스트라이프스 퍼레이드 방해하지 말고 피그 씨를 구조해, 출동!

translation.en: Move out!
translation.ko: 퍼레이드 방해하지 말고 피그 씨를 구조해, 출동!

translation.en: Splash, I have a very special high-priority job for you. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 스플래시, 넌 우선적으로 해야 할 아주 특별한 일이 있어

translation.en: -Teach me to plumb. -[sighs]
Right. So, I'm going to demonstrate the basics of plumbing
translation.ko: 좋아요, 그럼 배관의 기본을 보여 드릴게요

translation.en: with this broken soap dispenser.
Doesn't look broken.
-[screams] -Oh! Sorry, Splash.
Hmm. Looks like fixing this will take all day.
Well, if we fix it before the parade finishes,
we can still see the… [audio distorting] …balloons.
-The parade is closing in! -We need to get Mr. Pig out of that bin.
translation.ko: - 퍼레이드가 오고 있어! - 피그 씨를 꺼내야 해

translation.en: [Mr. Pig] Over here!
Help me!
Okay. Go over it again, Mr. Pig.
How exactly did you get stuck in a bin?
Well, I bought some potatoes to eat while watching the parade,
and, well, you know, things got a bit out of hand.
How long's this going to take? I mean, I can't see the parade.
translation.ko: 얼마나 걸릴까? 퍼레이드가 안 보여서 말이야

translation.en: -I can't get him out. -[Pecky] Stand clear!
We need maximum power!
I'll be gentle.
-Come on! -[concrete crumbles]
[grunts] Come on!
Did it work?
[Stripes] Major, Mr. Pig is stuck in a bin stuck in a crater.
translation.ko: 피그 씨가 쓰레기통에 갇힌 채 구덩이에 박혔어요

translation.en: -What do we do? -Come again?
Mr. Pig is now in a crater in the middle of the road.
If we don't do something, we'll have to cancel the parade.
translation.ko: 손을 쓰지 않으면 퍼레이드를 취소해야 해요

translation.en: -You better take a look. The balloons-- -Balloons! No, no, no!
No problem. [chuckles] I don't need to see the balloons.
translation.ko: 문제없어, 난 풍선 안 봐도 돼

translation.en: I'll simply reroute the parade down another road.
Oh, Major.
What if we reroute the parade to go past HQ?
translation.ko: 그럼 우리 본부를 지나가게 하면 어때요?

translation.en: Then we can do Bonding Day and see the parade.
translation.ko: '단결의 날'도 지키고 퍼레이드도 볼 수 있게요

translation.en: Bring the massive balloons here?
[chuckles nervously] My, my, what a creative idea.
Yes, I'll do that right away.
This route will completely avoid headquarters.
translation.ko: 이 경로면 본부를 완벽히 피해 갈 거야

translation.en: The parade must not come past HQ.
Never!
[Splash] Right past HQ?
[chuckles] Right past HQ.
[softly] There. Nowhere near HQ. Mm-hmm.
[Prickles] Stripes, I'm sending you the new route now.
Major, is this correct?
Yes. Totally correct.
Even though it goes over Windy Bridge,
the bridge notorious for being extremely windy and terribly unsafe?
Yep.
[whistles] The parade has been rerouted. Follow me.
Hmm. Much as I suspected.
Major, we have a problem.
-The wind on Windy Bridge is too windy. -[exclaims]
The balloons are lifting people into the air.
Oh no! Secure the balloons to the bridge and get the civilians out of there.
translation.ko: 안 돼! 풍선을 다리에 고정하고 시민들을 대피시켜

translation.en: [Stripes] Yes.
Please make your way off the bridge. Please make your way off the bridge.
Chaotic scenes as Big Tree City Rescue prevent the parade from blowing away.
translation.ko: 퍼레이드 행렬이 날아가는 걸 구조대가 막는 혼돈의 현장입니다

translation.en: -Major? -[screams]
Windy Bridge leads away from HQ.
Ooh, uh, Splash, I didn't want the parade to go past HQ.
translation.ko: 스플래시, 난 퍼레이드가 본부를 지나가는 걸 원치 않았어

translation.en: So I rerouted it in completely the opposite direction.
translation.ko: 그래서 완전히 반대 방향으로 경로를 바꿨지

translation.en: But why?
I have a phobia.
-Of wind? -No, of balloons.
-Ooh, I'm petrified of 'em. -But balloons are great.
They're bouncy and funny, and when you pop them, they go bang!
translation.ko: 통통 튀고 재밌잖아요 터뜨리면 소리도 나고, 펑!

translation.en: Exactly. The way they wobble about, floating like ghosts.
translation.ko: 바로 그거야, 유령처럼 둥둥 떠다니는 것도 싫지만

translation.en: But it’s the popping I dread the most.
And the Big Tree City balloons are the biggest balloons you’ve ever seen.
translation.ko: 그리고 빅 트리 시티 풍선은 네가 본 것 중 최고로 크단 말이야

translation.en: I've never seen the balloons before.
What? Really?
I've always wanted to see the Big Tree City Parade,
translation.ko: 올챙이 때부터 빅 트리 시티 퍼레이드가

translation.en: ever since I was a tadpole.
But I forgot about Bonding Day, and I don't wanna let you down.
translation.ko: 근데 '단결의 날'을 깜박했고 실망시켜 드리고 싶지 않았어요

translation.en: I'm the one who let you down, Splash.
I used Bonding Day as an excuse to avoid the balloons,
and in doing so, ruined Parade Day for you.
translation.ko: 그로 인해서 네가 기대한 퍼레이드 날을 망쳐버렸어

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Ah, don't worry. I'll see the parade next year.
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요 퍼레이드는 내년에 보면 돼요

translation.en: Besides, the balloons aren't going anywhere.
translation.ko: 게다가 풍선은 아무 데도 안 가잖아요

translation.en: -The balloons are going somewhere. -[both] No!
translation.ko: - 풍선이 어딘가로 가고 있습니다 - 안 돼!

translation.en: -Oh no! -The bridge!
Major, the bridge is airborne.
Ah! Hold tight. Prickles is on the case.
I'll come up with a plan. Oh, plan, plan. Need a plan.
translation.ko: 계획을 생각해 낼 거야 계획, 계획이 필요해

translation.en: Oh, I can't think straight when there are balloons involved.
I've got a plan.
Amazing.
Ah, look, you can see the Horatio Square Monument from here.
translation.ko: 저기 봐, 호레이쇼 광장의 기념탑이 보여

translation.en: -[all gasp] -Oh no! We're headed straight for it!
translation.ko: 안 돼! 거기로 곧장 가고 있어!

translation.en: How are we gonna stop this bridge?
[Prickles] Don't worry, everyone. We're here.
Oh, this is most undignified.
They're everything I imagined.
No! They're everything I imagined!
Right. Seen 'em now. Let's get this bridge back on the ground
translation.ko: 자, 이제 봤으니까 기념탑에 충돌하기 전에

translation.en: before it crashes into Horatio Bear Monument. For Bonding Day!
For Bonding Day!
Goodness, I just popped a balloon and it was fun.
See? Balloons are fun!
Balloons are fun!
This is for all those birthday parties I could've gone to. Hi-ya!
translation.ko: 이건 그동안 생일 파티 못 갔던 걸 대신해서!

translation.en: [gasps] They're using Major Prickles's spiky bum as a weapon!
translation.ko: 대장님이 뾰족한 엉덩이 가시를 무기로 쓰고 있어!

translation.en: This is for all those hot-air balloon rides I missed out on.
translation.ko: 이건 그동안 열기구 못 탔던 걸 대신해서!

translation.en: -Quick, Major! We're running out of time! -I'm on it.
-[whoops] -One more!
And this is for the time my sister got married in that balloon factory.
translation.ko: 이건 풍선 공장에서 했던 누이 결혼식에 못 간 걸 대신해서!

translation.en: You did it, Major!
All thanks to you, Splash. Bonding Day complete.
translation.ko: 다 네 덕분이야, 스플래시 '단결의 날' 임무 완료

translation.en: The Big Tree City Parade's latest addition of a screaming, flying hedgehog is a hit.
translation.ko: 공중을 나는 고슴도치가 맹활약한 올해의 퍼레이드는 대성공을 거뒀습니다

translation.en: We look forward to seeing it next year. I'm Ted Lister.
translation.ko: 내년에도 볼 수 있길 기대하며 이상 테드 리스터였습니다

translation.en: Exercise! [laughs]
[grunts] It's the most important meal of the day.
translation.ko: 하루 세 끼 중 가장 중요한 식사지

translation.en: And I eat exercise for breakfast.
But it's a meal I must eat on my own.
If only I could exercise with the team. But I must do it in secret.
translation.ko: 우리 팀과 함께 운동하면 좋겠지만 비밀리에 해야 하지

translation.en: No one must ever see…
the sweating!
What are you doing, Major? You gonna exercise with us?
Oh! Oh, uh, wait, I…
Let's get a sweat on!
Sweat? No! There's no need to sweat.
translation.ko: 땀? 아니! 땀 흘릴 필요 없어

translation.en: Who's sweating? Definitely not me.
We've never worked out together. I'll join you!
translation.ko: 같이 운동한 적 없잖아요 저랑 해요!

translation.en: No, no. No need. No need.
-I usually work out solo. Oh. -[groans]
Wanna lift some weights with me, Major? Really makes you… [audio distorting] …sweaty.
translation.ko: 저랑 같이 덤벨 운동 하실래요? 땀이 어마어마하게 난답니다

translation.en: Oh, no, thanks, Pecky. Ooh!
Check it out, Major. This bike powers a smoothie maker.
translation.ko: 이것 보세요, 대장님 스무디 기계에 연결돼서

translation.en: The more you pedal, the more power it generates.
translation.ko: 페달을 많이 밟을수록 전기가 더 만들어져요

translation.en: It's great for building up a sweat. Wanna have a go, Major?
-Ah! I can't. No. -Why not?
-Uh, the telephone might ring. -Are you avoiding exercise, Major?
translation.ko: - 전화가 올지도 몰라 - 운동을 피하시는 거예요?

translation.en: [whimpers and chuckles nervously] What? That's… Why would I…
Oh, I mean, don't be silly.
-[rings] -Oh, telephone! Thank goodness, an emergency.
Big Tree Exercise, how can I sweat you?
translation.ko: 빅 트리 운동입니다 어떻게 땀 나게 해드릴까요?

translation.en: Really? Oh no. Team, to the briefing room.
translation.ko: 그래요? 오, 안 돼 팀, 회의실로 모여

translation.en: What's gotten into him?
There's been a power cut at the Big Tree City Music Stadium.
translation.ko: 빅 트리 시티 음악 공연장에 정전이 발생했다

translation.en: And the famous pop star Lil JJ is performing a concert there tonight.
translation.ko: 유명한 팝 스타 릴 제이제이가 오늘 밤에 공연하기로 돼 있어

translation.en: Not Lil JJ!
The best pop star ever! I'm her biggest fan.
Excuse me. I'm her biggest fan. Have you even heard her new hit single?
translation.ko: 저기요, 내가 왕팬이거든요? 새 히트곡 들어봤어?

translation.en: Yes, I have. And did you know that she's playing it at tonight's concert?
translation.ko: 들어봤지, 오늘 공연에서 그거 부를 건데 알고 있었냐?

translation.en: Unless we fix the power at the stadium, there won't be a concert.
translation.ko: 정전 사태 해결을 못 하면 공연은 없어

translation.en: No power, no lights, no sound.
translation.ko: 전기가 없으면 조명도 없고 사운드도 없지

translation.en: And no Lil JJ.
-No! -No!
This is top priority. Kit and I will head over
translation.ko: 이게 제일 급해 키트와 난 발전소로 가서 문제를 해결할 수 있는지 볼 테니

translation.en: to the power station and see if we can fix the problem.
translation.ko: 키트와 난 발전소로 가서 문제를 해결할 수 있는지 볼 테니

translation.en: Meanwhile, Flame and Tricks take a backup power generator
translation.ko: 그동안 플레임과 트릭스는 만약의 사태에 대비해서 예비 발전기를 공연장에 가져가

translation.en: to the stadium in case anything goes wrong.
translation.ko: 만약의 사태에 대비해서 예비 발전기를 공연장에 가져가

translation.en: -[both] Yes, Major. -Move out!
Connections connected.
It's amazing to think that Lil JJ's concert
translation.ko: 릴 제이제이의 공연이 내 발전기 전기로 치러질지도 모른다니, 진짜 신기해

translation.en: might be powered by my generator. Huh?
translation.ko: 내 발전기 전기로 치러질지도 모른다니, 진짜 신기해

translation.en: But it'll only be running thanks to me starting it.
translation.ko: 하지만 작동되려면 내가 시동을 걸어야 하지

translation.en: -Oh no! Tricks, fix it! -What are we gonna do?
translation.ko: - 안 돼! 트릭스, 고쳐! - 우리 어떡해?

translation.en: The concert starts soon!
[both] It's Lil JJ.
She's amazing.
We should say hi.
Yeah, but be cool.
[gasps] It's you! It's really you! Hi, hello. Welcome. I'm Flicks. This is Trame.
translation.ko: 정말로 왔군요! 난 플릭스, 얜 트레임이에요

translation.en: Hello. Hi, how are you? Sorry to bother you. We're just… Wowzers!
-[both] I'm your biggest fan! -Is that so?
Aren't you the sweetest?
Wanna come backstage?
[both exclaim] Yes, please!
Like I was saying, I'm your biggest fan.
Uh, second biggest. I'm your biggest fan.
translation.ko: 두 번째 왕팬이죠 내가 제일 왕팬이에요

translation.en: [Flame] Well, I'm really bigger than you, so I guess I'm the biggest fan.
translation.ko: 내가 더 왕팬이거든? 내가 제일 왕팬이야

translation.en: Okay, Major. Looks like we can get the stadium's power back on
translation.ko: 좋아요, 대장님 다시 전력을 공급하려면 저 스위치만 당기면 될 것 같아요

translation.en: with a simple pull of that switch.
translation.ko: 다시 전력을 공급하려면 저 스위치만 당기면 될 것 같아요

translation.en: Oh, good. Just a pull of a switch and off we go. [laughs]
Oh! Had I known we were exercising, I would've worn a sweatband.
translation.ko: 이렇게 운동할 줄 알았으면 땀 밴드를 하는 건데

translation.en: Hmm. Not quite as straightforward as I was expecting,
but this shouldn't be too difficult. I just need to…
What was that?
-[exclaims] Nothing. -Thought I heard a splat.
Uh, nope. [chuckles] No splat. Definitely not. No.
translation.ko: 아냐, 튀는 소리는 무슨 아무 일도 없었어

translation.en: Are we done? Is the power back on?
Almost. We just need to pull these things 200 times,
this thing 800 times, 50 sets of those, push this heavy button 1,000 times,
translation.ko: 이거 800번, 이거 50세트 하고 이 무거운 버튼 1,000번 누르고

translation.en: pull on these, tug on this, then trek 300 miles. But we have to do it together.
translation.ko: 당기고 내리고 480km 걸으면 되는데 같이 해야 해요

translation.en: Major?
Major? What's going on?
I'm not sweating.
What? The concert's starting soon and we still haven't got the power on.
translation.ko: 네? 공연이 곧 시작인데 아직 전기가 안 들어오잖아요

translation.en: All that gadgetry will take far too long.
translation.ko: 그거 다 하려면 너무 오래 걸려

translation.en: Besides, Flame and Tricks have it all under control. [laughs]
translation.ko: 게다가 플레임과 트릭스가 알아서 하고 있어

translation.en: -Get in, Kit. -[yelps]
Tonight's concert will feature all my best songs.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 공연에선 명곡을 다 부를 거예요

translation.en: Much better than last year, when I only played all my worst songs.
translation.ko: 작년보다 훨씬 나을 거예요 그땐 최악의 곡들만 불렀거든요

translation.en: Anyway, I better get ready. It's nearly showtime.
Tricks. Flame. Everything okay at the stadium?
translation.ko: 트릭스, 플레임 공연장은 아무 문제 없어?

translation.en: Tell me everything's okay. All okay, isn't it?
translation.ko: 다 괜찮다고 말해 줘 다 괜찮은 거지?

translation.en: OMG, it's brilliant!
translation.ko: - 세상에, 대박이야! - 최고의 날! 너무 잘되고 있어!

translation.en: Best day ever! It's going so well! So well!
translation.ko: - 세상에, 대박이야! - 최고의 날! 너무 잘되고 있어! 완전 잘되고 있어!

translation.en: Excellent! So you've got the generator running.
-Tricks couldn't start it! -Flame broke it!
[both] It was my fault!
Oh well. We could go back to the power station and--
It's no good. We'll have to cancel the concert. Cancel it.
This is a disaster. No power, no way to find the power or power it.
translation.ko: 재앙이야, 전기도 없고 복구할 방법도 가동할 방법도 없어

translation.en: No, there's just no possible way…
to generate the power.
How about we use the exercise bike?
Brilliant, Stripes. We can power the concert
translation.ko: - 운동용 자전거는 어때요? - 훌륭해, 스트라이프스 몇 시간만 엄청 열심히 페달 밟아서 공연에 쓰면 돼요

translation.en: by pedaling really hard for just a few hours.
translation.ko: 몇 시간만 엄청 열심히 페달 밟아서 공연에 쓰면 돼요

translation.en: Like a really intense gym session.
Yes. Let's build up a sweat and save the Lil JJ concert.
translation.ko: 땀을 뻘뻘 흘려서 릴 제이제이의 공연을 살리자고요

translation.en: Anyone got any other ideas?
♪ Music is my passion It's never out of fashion ♪
translation.ko: 음악은 내 열정 절대 유행에 뒤지지 않아

translation.en: ♪ Pop songs are for everyone Even if they're really not ♪
translation.ko: 팝송은 모두를 위한 것 그렇지 않을지라도

translation.en: ♪ Like this one It goes on and on and on ♪
♪ Let's all dance together Come on ♪
♪ I want to dance all night and forever ♪
♪ I wanna get a sweat on And on and on and on ♪
Come on. The last song is nearly finished. Use every last bit of energy you have.
translation.ko: 힘내, 마지막 곡이 거의 끝났어 젖 먹던 힘까지 다해

translation.en: [Lil JJ] Thank you, thank you!
It's been such a wonderful night, and you've been such a wonderful audience!
translation.ko: 정말 멋진 밤이고 여러분은 정말 멋진 관객이에요!

translation.en: We did it, team.
Let's all go home.
My legs.
I… I hate music. [panting]
And the show is not over yet, people. I'll now perform my new hit single!
translation.ko: 여러분, 아직 안 끝났어요 저의 새 히트곡을 불러 드릴게요!

translation.en: -What? -Huh?
[gasps] It's the new song.
Huh? Another song?
Okay, who's up for more cycling?
-Stripes? -I was before Kit.
Is it Pecky's go?
Ma… Maximum power.
We're losing power.
Quick! Someone has to pedal.
We can't. We've got no energy left.
You're the only one who can pedal, Major.
[grunts] But I can't.
Why not?
Because
I sweat, Kit. I sweat bad.
I mean, really bad.
Every time the team exercises, I feel I have to hide away.
translation.ko: 팀이 운동할 때마다 난 숨고만 싶었어

translation.en: ♪ Don't hide away That's what I say ♪
translation.ko: 숨지 말아요, 그 말을 하고 싶어요

translation.en: But I sweat. I sweat a lot. Someone might laugh at me.
translation.ko: 하지만 너무 많이 흘린단 말이야 보면 비웃을지도 몰라

translation.en: ♪ Friends won't laugh It's okay ♪
I should just do it.
♪ You need to show them Who you really are ♪
Show the real me.
We failed!
The concert's ruined.
-Huh? -What?
Stand back, everyone. This hedgehog's going to get a sweat on!
translation.ko: 다들 물러서 이 고슴도치가 땀을 흘릴 거야

translation.en: Let's make this the best concert ever!
♪ Pick yourself up when you are blue ♪
♪ …turn on to me ♪
♪ Power up, power up, power up ♪
-Amazing! -Go, Major!
See, Major? You're not even sweating that mu-- Ugh!
translation.ko: 봤죠, 대장님? 땀이 별로 나지도 않잖…

translation.en: -Where is it all coming from? -Gross!
[laughing] You were right, Kit. There's no need to be embarrassed.
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞다, 키트 창피해할 필요가 없어

translation.en: Major, you're generating too much power!
translation.ko: 대장님, 전기를 너무 많이 만들고 있어요!

translation.en: I feel like a new hog! A hog who can sweat as much as he likes! ♪ Yeah Whoa, whoa… ♪
translation.ko: 새 고슴도치가 된 기분이야! 맘껏 땀 흘릴 수 있는 고슴도치!

translation.en: It's all going to collapse! We need to secure the stage!
translation.ko: 다 무너지겠어! 무대 안전을 확보해야 해

translation.en: Kit, water!
-Yes, Major. -[slurps]
[laughs] I've been hiding my perspiration away all my life,
and there was never a need to.
-It's okay to sweat, isn't it? -Yep.
translation.ko: - 땀 흘려도 괜찮아, 안 그래? - 네

translation.en: ♪ Don't be afraid to show the real you ♪
translation.ko: 두려워 말고 당신의 진짜 모습을 보여 줘요

translation.en: -You did it, Major. -[crowd cheers]
We all did it.
Let's hear it for Big Tree City Rescue!
translation.ko: 빅 트리 시티 구조대에 힘찬 박수 부탁드려요!

translation.en: When it came to saving the concert, they truly had the power.
So, all the electricity is generated by that little machine of yours?
translation.ko: 저 작은 기계로 전기를 다 만들어 낸 거예요?

translation.en: That's correct.
So who's pedaling now?
♪ La, la, la La, la, la, la, let's go! ♪
